con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions name="bif-b2b-get-version" targetNamespace="http://www.tcf.org.nz/v0.0.1/bif/getVersion" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://www.tcf.org.nz/v0.0.1/bif/getVersion" xmlns:ver="http://www.tcf.org.nz/v0.0.1/bif/getVersion" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:diag="http://www.tcf.org.nz/v0.0.1/bif/MessageDiagnostic" xmlns:wsp="http://www.w3.org/ns/ws-policy" xmlns:wsu="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-utility-1.0.xsd" xmlns:sp="http://docs.oasis-open.org/ws-sx/ws-securitypolicy/200702"> <wsdl:types> <xsd:schema> <xsd:import namespace="http://www.tcf.org.nz/v0.0.1/bif/MessageDiagnostic" schemaLocation="../xsd/transport/MessageDiagnostic.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://www.tcf.org.nz/v0.0.1/bif/getVersion" schemaLocation="../xsd/version/GetServiceVersionDetails.xsd"/> </xsd:schema> </wsdl:types> <!--===========================================================================================================--> <!--Acquire back-end [SOAP Action] version details for a service. Allows customer to confirm the version of the service interface that will process their request for the required SOAP action given. See [GetServiceVersionDetails] XSD complex type for details of the required input parameters and corresponding return data.--> <!--===========================================================================================================--> <wsdl:message name="GetServiceVersionDetailsRequest"> <wsdl:part name="GetServiceVersionDetailsRequest" element="ver:GetServiceVersionDetailsRequest"/> </wsdl:message> <!--===========================================================================================================--> <wsdl:message name="GetServiceVersionDetailsResponse"> <wsdl:part name="GetServiceVersionDetailsResponse" element="ver:GetServiceVersionDetailsResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <!--===========================================================================================================--> <wsdl:message name="MessageDiagnostic"> <wsdl:part name="MessageDiagnostic" element="diag:MessageDiagnostic"/> </wsdl:message> <!--===========================================================================================================--> <wsdl:portType name="B2BEndpointPortType"> <wsdl:operation name="GetServiceVersionDetails"> <wsdl:input name="GetServiceVersionDetailsRequest" message="ver:GetServiceVersionDetailsRequest"/> <wsdl:output name="GetServiceVersionDetailsResponse" message="ver:GetServiceVersionDetailsResponse"/> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <!--=================================================================================================================================--> <wsp:Policy wsu:Id="AsymmetricX509MutualAuthentication"> <wsp:ExactlyOne> <wsp:All> <sp:AsymmetricBinding> <wsp:Policy> <sp:InitiatorToken> <wsp:Policy> <sp:X509Token sp:IncludeToken="http://docs.oasis-open.org/ws-sx/ws-securitypolicy/200702/IncludeToken/Always"> <wsp:Policy> <sp:WssX509V3Token10/> </wsp:Policy> </sp:X509Token> </wsp:Policy> </sp:InitiatorToken> <sp:RecipientToken> <wsp:Policy> <sp:X509Token sp:IncludeToken="http://docs.oasis-open.org/ws-sx/ws-securitypolicy/200702/IncludeToken/Always"> <wsp:Policy> <sp:WssX509V3Token10/> <sp:RequireIssuerSerialReference/> </wsp:Policy> </sp:X509Token> </wsp:Policy> </sp:RecipientToken> <sp:OnlySignEntireHeadersAndBody/> <sp:AlgorithmSuite> <wsp:Policy> <sp:Basic256/> </wsp:Policy> </sp:AlgorithmSuite> </wsp:Policy> </sp:AsymmetricBinding> <sp:Wss11> <wsp:Policy> <sp:MustSupportRefIssuerSerial/> </wsp:Policy> </sp:Wss11> </wsp:All> </wsp:ExactlyOne> </wsp:Policy> <!--=================================================================================================================================--> <wsp:Policy wsu:Id="TcfBifWebServicesIndustryFrameworkInputBindingPolicy"> <wsp:ExactlyOne> <wsp:All> <sp:SignedParts> <sp:Body/> <sp:Header Namespace="http://www.tcf.org.nz/v0.0.1/bif/message"/> </sp:SignedParts> </wsp:All> </wsp:ExactlyOne> </wsp:Policy> <wsp:Policy wsu:Id="TcfBifWebServicesIndustryFrameworkOutputBindingPolicy"> <wsp:ExactlyOne> <wsp:All> <sp:SignedParts> <sp:Body/> <sp:Header Namespace="http://www.tcf.org.nz/v0.0.1/bif/message"/> </sp:SignedParts> </wsp:All> </wsp:ExactlyOne> </wsp:Policy> <!--=================================================================================================================================--> <wsdl:binding name="B2BEndpointBinding" type="ver:B2BEndpointPortType"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsp:PolicyReference URI="#AsymmetricX509MutualAuthentication"/> <!--^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^--> <wsdl:operation name="GetServiceVersionDetails"> <soap:operation soapAction="GetServiceVersionDetails" style="document"/> <wsdl:input> <wsp:PolicyReference URI="#TcfBifWebServicesIndustryFrameworkInputBindingPolicy"/> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <wsp:PolicyReference URI="#TcfBifWebServicesIndustryFrameworkOutputBindingPolicy"/> <soap:body use="literal"/> <soap:header message="ver:MessageDiagnostic" part="MessageDiagnostic" use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <!--^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^--> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="B2BEndpointService"> <wsdl:port name="B2BEndpointPortType" binding="ver:B2BEndpointBinding"> <soap:address location="http://www.tcf.org.nz/v0.0.1/bif/getVersion"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://www.tcf.org.nz/v0.0.1/bif/MessageDiagnostic" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:md="http://www.tcf.org.nz/v0.0.1/bif/MessageDiagnostic"> <xsd:element name="MessageDiagnostic" type="md:MessageDiagnostic"/> <xsd:complexType name="MessageDiagnostic"> <!--A URI reference to the SOAP header containing the Message Diagnostic Header information--> <xsd:attribute name="messageDiagnosticHeaderReference" type="xsd:anyURI"/> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://www.tcf.org.nz/v0.0.1/bif/getVersion" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:ver="http://www.tcf.org.nz/v0.0.1/bif/getVersion"> <xsd:element name="GetServiceVersionDetailsRequest" type="ver:GetServiceVersionDetailsRequest"/> <xsd:element name="GetServiceVersionDetailsResponse" type="ver:GetServiceVersionDetailsResponse"/> <xsd:complexType name="GetServiceVersionDetailsRequest"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="soapAction" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="GetServiceVersionDetailsResponse"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="soapAction" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="currentServiceVersion" type="xsd:string"/> <!--Customer details acquired from SOAP Header--> <xsd:element name="customerVersion" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="customerVersionExpiry" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="customerVersionWorksWithCurrentVersion" type="xsd:boolean"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>
